projects.name: Task Manager Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and advanced filtering. Built with React and Firebase for seamless team productivity.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather visualization platform featuring 7-day forecasts, historical data analysis, and customizable alerts. Integrates with multiple weather APIs for accurate predictions.

projects.name: Budget Tracker
projects.description: Personal finance management tool with automatic categorization, spending insights, and budget goals. Features secure bank integration and monthly reports with visualizations.

projects.name: Code Snippet Library
projects.description: Developer tool for organizing and sharing code snippets across teams. Supports syntax highlighting for 50+ languages, tagging system, and private/public collections.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: Mobile-first fitness application tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress photos. Includes AI-powered workout recommendations and integration with popular fitness devices.

projects.name: Recipe Finder
projects.description: Smart recipe discovery platform with ingredient-based search, meal planning, and shopping list generation. Features dietary filters and nutritional information for healthy cooking.
